Come Visit Us!

We are located off the corner of E 82nd Street and S Maryland Ave in East Chatham, Chicago, Illinois.

We strive to brind fresh seafood and other delights to the Windy City on a daily basis, and would love for you to visit!

About Us

Old Line Crab House started out of the dream of it's owner, a Maryland Native who moved to Chicago, Illinois to pursue other dreams.

Years after moving, and fed up with the outrageous costs of shipping small bushels of crabs to Illinois, they began planning to open Old Line Crab House. Our goal is to spread the delicious cultural foods of the mid-atlantic, many of which are impossible to find outside the area.

We hope to see you soon!

Old Line Crab House
